title: Novotel Sunshine Coast Beachfront Escape with Saltwater Lagoon, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Experience the epitome of laidback Queensland living and take in impressive views from all angles at Novotel Sunshine Coast Resort. This sprawling resort puts the sand and sunshine on your doorstep, with the beach just metres away and the lively atmosphere of Mooloolaba within easy reach. Exceptional facilities, including a gleaming resort-style pool, poolside cocktail bar and private saltwater lagoon, are sure to impress, while dreamy rooms and bungalows ensure blissful relaxation with a stylish twist. Each accommodation has been superbly designed - whether it's families, groups or couples seeking their time in the sun - each light-filled room boasts generous private balconies or patios and spectacular views.

Ideally located to make the most of the area, this superb resort is the ideal launchpad for exploring the Sunshine Coast's world-class beaches, exceptional restaurants, striking hinterland and thrilling attractions. A two-minute walk will take you to Mudjimba Beach, a stretch of golden sand perfect for a romantic seaside stroll or family fun, while the shops, cafes, restaurants and nightlife of Maroochydore are just a short drive away. A little further afield, you can enjoy world-class hiking through the forested Glass House Mountains, and spend the day at Australia Zoo or the swells of Noosa Beach. Round out each day at the onsite Sola Restaurant or toast to your stay at Sola Bar.
offer_address: 270 Ocean Drive, Twin Waters, Queensland 4564, Australia

title: The Ultimate Family Holiday on the Sunshine Coast
description: Get your family and friends together for a fun-filled coastal getaway, staying in a spacious, fully self-contained Two-Bedroom Apartment at The Sebel Twin Waters. Surrounded by the waters of the Pacific Ocean, the Maroochydore River and a picturesque salt-water lagoon, it’s a peaceful paradise in sunny Queensland. Included in your escape are unlimited resort water activities, a bottle of wine on arrival, an AU$50 food and beverage voucher for use at The Sebel’s sister property, Novotel Twin Waters, an AU$25 spa voucher, daily pool towel hire, free Wi-Fi and more.
offer_address: 80 N Shore Rd, Twin Waters QLD 4564

title: Novotel Sunshine Coast Beachfront Resort with Saltwater Lagoon, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Experience the epitome of laidback Queensland living with impressive views from all angles at this sprawling resort. Enjoy sand and sunshine on your doorstep, with the beach just metres away and lively Mooloolaba within easy reach. offer_address: 270 Ocean Drive, Twin Waters, Queensland 4564, Australia

title: Five-Star Sunshine Coast Luxe Spa Apartment Stay Opposite Bulcock Beach
description:
Experience the best of the Sunshine Coast at this coastal-inspired family-friendly escape, perfectly positioned in the heart of Caloundra, just steps from Bulcock Beach. Tower over the shore's sun-kissed sands in a self-contained apartment, complete with a spa bath and fully equipped kitchen, and bask in the relaxed coastal atmosphere, buzzing with boutique shopping and a thriving dining and events scene.

This stylish resort is your launchpad to a treasure trove of natural and man-made wonders, wildlife sanctuaries and weekly markets, plus Mooloolaba, Maroochydore, Coolum and Noosa. When you've had your fill of South East Queensland's myriad of activities, make the most of the resort's serene beachside setting and impeccable list of facilities, including two onsite pools and the stylish yet relaxed 26° Bar + Venue.

title: Self-Contained Sunshine Coast Apartments Steps from Mooloolaba Beach with Welcome Wine & Late Checkout
description:
Embrace the laidback beachside lifestyle with a self-contained apartment escape at Coco Mooloolaba, positioned just moments from the town's spectacular golden shores. Become enchanted with days spent in this picturesque Sunshine Coast hub, soaking up the sun on Mooloolaba's famous sweep of glittering beachfront or wandering The Esplanade, where the town's incomparable seaside ambience is at its best. Each one- or two-bedroom apartment has been superbly designed with groups in mind - whether it's families, groups or couples seeking their time in the sun - and boasts light-filled rooms, generous private balconies, kitchen and laundry facilities.

Coco Mooloolaba's modern, coastal-inspired furnishings and flourishes of colour reflect and celebrate its extraordinary coastal locale. The sparkling outdoor heated pool and spa offers endless blissful moments basking in the tropical warmth, and the immaculately landscaped BBQ area is perfect for the entertainers in the group. When you're ready to explore, grab a board and hit the town's world-class waves, or dive the nearby sunken HMAS Brisbane for an experience that'll stay with you for years to come.

title: Sunshine Coast Beachfront Stay near Noosa with Dining Credit & Hinterland Lunch & Winery Tour Upgrade
description:
Follow the sun-kissed Queensland coast to Ramada by Wyndham Marcoola Beach, a relaxing beachfront resort on the Sunshine Coast's glorious shores, just a 25-minute drive from Noosa. Home to a poolside bistro and open-air cocktail bar, a sunlit lagoon pool with a kids' wading area and a day spa, this tranquil retreat has something for everyone. When you're not enjoying the beautiful surroundings, kick back with some cocktails at SurfAir Beach Bistro - the perfect place to soak up the seaside vibes with a delicious meal.

Explore the surrounding coastal trails on foot or take to two wheels and feel the sea breeze as you cycle through exquisite native greenery along the unparalleled Australian shoreline. Plunge into the rolling waves on a boogie board or take the drive north to bustling, cosmopolitan Noosa, where top restaurants, high-end boutiques and more gorgeous beaches await. Immerse yourself in the laidback, sun-kissed atmosphere and live as the locals do in this beachside paradise.
offer_address: 923 David Low Way, Marcoola Beach, Queensland 4564, Australia

title: Luxe Sunshine Coast Apartment Resort with Ocean Views & Welcome Wine
description:
Escape to the Sunshine Coast for a relaxing break under Queensland’s sun at the luxe Monaco Caloundra. This exceptional beachside retreat - currently ranked in the top 5 resorts in the coastal town of Caloundra on TripAdvisor, and winner of a TripAdvisor Travellers' Choice 2020 award - boasts an ideal location in the heart of it all, steps from the pristine shores of Bulcock Beach and from the town's shops, restaurants and bars. Relax in your upgraded apartment offering sweeping views over the crystal-clear waters of the Moreton Bay Marine Park and beyond.

Whether you are looking for a relaxing break or want to experience an action-packed escape filled with boating, fishing and surfing, Monaco Caloundra is the ideal launchpad to this beautiful part of Queensland.

title: Luxe Apartment Stay for up to Four People with Daily Breakfast
description: Escape to the Sunshine Coast with a stay at Rumba Beach Resort in the seaside town of Caloundra. Just an hour’s drive from Brisbane and surrounded by six beaches, it’s the perfect spot for a relaxing break spent sunbathing or an action-packed holiday filled with boating, fishing and surfing. Included in your escape is daily light breakfast, a bottle of sparkling wine on arrival, handmade local chocolate, complimentary Wi-Fi and unlimited on-demand movies, secure car parking and a leisurely late midday check-out

title: Sunshine Coast Self-Contained Mooloolaba Apartments Steps from the Beach
description:
Get a taste of life by the beach with a luxe apartment escape at Coco Mooloolaba, ranked in the top 10% of resorts worldwide by Tripadvisor in 2021. Allow the magic of this bustling Sunshine Coast hub to capture your attention with a dreamy stay just steps from the famous sweep of glittering Mooloolaba beachfront or head to The Esplanade, where you can immerse yourself in the causal yet inviting seaside atmosphere.

Each of the one or two-bedroom apartments has been superbly designed for families, groups or couples seeking sun-soaked moments, complete with light-filled rooms, generously sized balconies, kitchen and laundry facilities plus modern, coastal-inspired furnishings to reflect the locale. The sparkling outdoor heated pool and heated spa is a haven for blissful moments basking in the tropical warmth, and the immaculately landscaped BBQ area is perfect for the entertainers in the group.

title: Secluded Five-Star Rainforest Villa Retreat with Gourmet Dining Hampers
description:
Discover tranquillity and take the romance up a notch with an adults-only break at Narrows Escape Luxury Rainforest Retreat in the lush Sunshine Coast Hinterland. Unwind in a luxurious self-contained villa hidden in two hectares of sub-tropical rainforest. Enjoy a gourmet breakfast hamper, a three-course BBQ dinner hamper, freshly baked croissants delivered daily and luxury organic Mukti & Essenza amenities, plus cheese, sparkling wine, port, chocolates and fresh roses on arrival.

**TripAdvisor Travellers’ Choice, Best of the Best 2020** Top Small Hotels - Australia  

**Staying longer?** Extend your stay to four or five nights and receive a bonus dinner hamper.

title: Airy Sunshine Coast Self-Contained Apartments Steps from Mooloolaba Beach with Hinterland Food & Wine Tour Upgrade Available
description:

When you're ready to explore, grab a board and hit the beach's world-class waves, or enjoy a breathtaking tour of the nearby Glass House Mountains with tastings of the best cheese and wine in the region.

title: Sunshine Coast Resort Escape with Lagoon Pool & Greg Norman-Designed Golf Course
description:
Your idyllic escape awaits just minutes from the golden shores of Caloundra at Pelican Waters Resort. Located in the heart of the laidback Sunshine Coast, only 90 minutes from Brisbane, with breathtaking views over the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Glass House Mountains, this resort retreat is perfect for unwinding poolside, discovering the plethora of natural wonders on your doorstep or perfecting your golf swing on the Greg Norman-designed course.

Enjoy the flexibility of an apartment-style stay with all the benefits of a resort. Discover incredible facilities such as Waterlilies Restaurant & Bar which overlooks the heated lagoon-style pool and lap pool, an onsite fitness centre, hairdresser and the adjacent Greg Norman-designed golf course.

**Your handpicked inclusions (select dates only):**

- Start your escape as soon as possible thanks to priority early check-in (weekdays only)
- Kick-off your escape with a welcome cocktail, glass of beer, wine or soft drink per guest (stays in August 2021 only)
- Celebrate your holiday with a bottle of bubbles and decadent chocolates on arrival
- Spends days relaxing by the pool with two pool towels provided
- Relax up until the last moment with 12pm late checkout (excludes Fridays and Saturdays)

**This deal has NO peak surcharges:** Travel any time for the same great price.

**One-Bedroom Apartment Upgrade:** Make the most of your stay when you upgrade to the spacious One-Bedroom Apartment which features a kitchenette, a spacious balcony for alfresco dinners and a separate bedroom.
offer_address: 38 Mahogany Dr Pelican Waters Queensland 4551 Australia

title: Sunshine Coast Self-Contained Studio Escape Overlooking Beachfront
description:
Follow the sun-kissed Queensland coast to Ramada Resort Golden Beach, a relaxing self-contained studio haven perched within easy reach of Sunshine Coast's glorious shores. Home to a glistening lagoon pool and a heated kids' wading pool, this palm-fringed retreat is perfectly suited for couples, groups or families travelling with children. Settle into your stylish home away from home, then make use of the excellent onsite facilities and work up a sweat at the indoor gym, unwind in the steam room or grab a bite at the onsite restaurant for flavoursome Thai cuisine.

Explore the surrounding coastal trails on foot or take to two wheels and feel the sea breeze on your face as you roll along the shores of Pumicestone Passage, take a refreshing dip in the ocean or take the drive north to bustling Noosa, where top restaurants, high-end boutiques and more gorgeous beaches await.
offer_address: 75 Esplanade Bulcock Beach, Caloundra QLD 4551 Australia

title: Award-Winning Sunshine Coast Family Resort with Waterpark & Daily Breakfast
description:
Discover award-winning relaxation redefined, a short stroll from the champagne shores of Golden Beach, at Oaks Sunshine Coast Oasis Resort - bringing a new dimension of fun to your next Queensland escape. Just over an hour from Brisbane and a short drive to Aussie World and Banana Bender Pub, Australia Zoo and SEA LIFE Sunshine Coast Aquarium, this top-rated escape has everything you’d expect of a property ranked within Tripadvisor’s top 1% worldwide and Australia’s Top 25 Hotels for Families.

Head out to immerse yourself in the tropical beauty of Caloundra’s six beaches, then retreat to this oasis where you’ll find a tropical pool fringed by 10 acres of luscious greenery, a 500sqm onsite waterpark complete with waterslides and an 18-hole mini-golf course to impress the kids.

**Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice, Best of the Best 2020** Top 25 Hotels for Families - Australia

title: Family-Friendly Sunshine Coast Beachside Apartment Escape with Guaranteed Upgrade
description:

title: Award-Winning Sunshine Coast Adults-Only Rainforest Villa Romance with Daily Breakfast
description:
Savour the tranquil sounds of ancient rainforest and babbling brooks at Narrows Escape Rainforest Retreat, a secluded adults-only nature escape in the lush Sunshine Coast Hinterland. Equal parts breathtaking as it is environmentally conscious, the eco-certified resort is one of few to claim Tripadvisor's GreenLeaders Gold level. In this ultra-romantic oasis, there are just eight exclusive villas, each thoughtfully equipped with fresh roses, handmade chocolates, organic bath products, a log fireplace and a wealth of local produce.

Located approximately a 1.5-hour drive north of Brisbane, on the edge of Kondalilla National Park, this beautiful retreat is just minutes from charming villages, waterfalls and swimming holes, award-winning restaurants, a myriad of walking trails and renowned wineries. Steps from civilisation yet miles away from the hustle and bustle, rest and relax on your private deck, find your way through waterfalls, rock pools and wilderness trails, or indulge in a romantic picnic with your favourite person.

title: Luxury Apartment Stay Only Metres from the Beach
description: Experience an ultra-stylish beachside escape on the Sunshine Coast at the luxurious Breeze Mooloolaba, showcasing chic, self-contained apartments opposite the sparkling waters of calm Mooloolaba Beach. Toast to a relaxing three or five-night getaway where the sun always shines with a welcome bottle of Prosecco and a guaranteed early check-in and late check-out.

title: Self-Contained Sunshine Coast Beachfront Apartments near Noosa with Welcome Bubbles & Late Checkout
description:
Surrounded by the echo of native birds and crashing waves, The Retreat Beach Houses offer a picturesque home-away-from-home. Overlooking the relaxing shores of Peregian Beach, this intimate, self-contained oasis is the perfect place to enjoy quality time with family, friends or a loved one on the Sunshine Coast.

Embrace coastal open-plan living in your modern beach house or enjoy a swing on the resort's full-size tennis courts followed by a dip in the climate-controlled swimming pool. Stroll down the private path to pristine Peregian Beach or hire a bike and explore the surrounding cycle routes (surcharges apply). In the evening, dine out at one of the lovely restaurants in the local village. Popular Hastings Street, with its world-class eateries, day spas and live music venues, is just a 15-minute drive away.
offer_address: 390 David Low Way, Peregian Beach, Noosa, QLD 4573

title: Ultra-Luxe Sunshine Coast Beachfront Apartments in the Heart of Mooloolaba
description:
Experience the beauty and sunkissed charm of the Sunshine Coast with a glamorous stay at Breeze Mooloolaba, an architecturally designed, self-contained haven with modern facilities in a prime waterfront location. Ideally situated beachfront, adjacent to the cobalt waters of Mooloolaba Beach, this luxury oasis is the perfect launchpad for exploring vibrant Mooloolaba and beyond.

Stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2021 badge, Breeze Mooloolaba offers guests a first-class experience through its idyllic settings, entertaining amenities, outstanding service and ultra-luxe collection of self-contained one and two-bedroom apartments. From the resort-style pool, spa and BBQ facilities to undercover parking, complimentary Wi-Fi and in-room movies, Breeze Mooloolaba will ensure ample opportunity for you to relax and rejuvenate in one of Australia's all-time favourite holiday destinations.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Toast your escape with a bottle of sparkling wine and complimentary bottled water on arrival
- Enjoy a cosy night in with unlimited on-demand movies

- Sleep in on your final day with a guaranteed 12pm late checkout

title: Sunshine Coast Beachside Spa Apartments Just 90 Minutes from Brisbane
description:
Enjoy a romantic escape with someone special or gather your family and friends for a luxe Sunshine Coast stay at Rumba Beach Resort, just a 90-minute drive from Brisbane and surrounded by six beaches. While Caloundra is a popular spot on the Sunshine Coast, it’s largely regarded as one of the most authentic and unspoiled locations in Queensland. The options here are endless. Spend days relaxing or enjoying watersports on one of the surrounding beaches (it’s just a short stroll to The Esplanade and Bulcock Beach), visit the fountain on the Kings Beach foreshore and the adjacent saltwater pool or take the kids to the zoo.

Enjoy all the amenities of a five-star resort while benefiting from the flexibility afforded by a self-catering apartment. Rumba Beach Resort offers two inviting swimming pools, a jacuzzi and bar plus an ideal location in the heart of Caloundra, just a short walk from the beach, restaurants and cafés.

title: Luxe Sunshine Coast Beachfront Apartments in the Heart of Mooloolaba

Experience the beauty and sunkissed charm of the Sunshine Coast with a glamorous stay at Breeze Mooloolaba, an architecturally designed, self-contained haven with modern facilities in a prime waterfront location. Ideally situated beachfront, adjacent to the cobalt waters of Mooloolaba Beach, this luxury oasis is the perfect launchpad for exploring vibrant Mooloolaba and beyond.

Breeze Mooloolaba offers guests a first-class experience through its idyllic setting, entertaining amenities, outstanding service and ultra-luxe collection of self-contained one and two-bedroom apartments. From the resort-style pool, spa and BBQ facilities to undercover parking, complimentary Wi-Fi and in-room movies, Breeze Mooloolaba will ensure ample opportunity for you to relax and rejuvenate in one of Australia's all-time favourite holiday destinations.
offer_address: 3 Meta Street, Corner of Mooloolaba Esplanade and Meta Street, Mooloolaba QLD 4557

title: Beachfront Sunshine Coast Beauty with Private Saltwater Lagoon & Onsite Restaurant
description:
Experience the coastal charm of Queensland with a stay at one of the most loved addresses in the Sunshine Coast. This tranquil retreat, located on a private lagoon, offers an idyllic blend of relaxation and adventure. Savour Sicilian flavours or sip a refreshing drink at Sola Bar & Restaurant, or get your caffeine dose at the Deli Café & Market along with some healthy bites.

There's no chance of boredom with a pool and endless activites like kayaking, catamaran sailing and more on the private lagoon. Explore the vibrant Maroochydore or stroll along the pristine Mudjimba Beach - both a short distance from the hotel.
offer_address: 270 Ocean Drive, Twin Waters, Sunshine Coast, Queensland 4564, Australia

title: The World's Most Romantic Retreat: Adults-Only Rainforest Villas in the Sunshine Coast Hinterland
description:
Savour the tranquil sounds of the ancient rainforest and babbling brooks at Narrows Escape Rainforest Retreat in the lush Sunshine Coast Hinterland - voted the most romantic property in the world in Tripadvisor's and ranking among the top 1% on the review site. Ideal for couples and honeymooners, all private adults-only villas are thoughtfully positioned to maximise the tranquility of nature, while providing each guest with total privacy, seclusion and romance. 

Located approximately a 1.5-hour drive north of Brisbane, close to the beaches of Noosa and the Sunshine Coast, this beautiful retreat is just minutes' drive from charming hinterland villages, waterfalls and swimming holes, award-winning restaurants, a myriad of walking trails and renowned wineries. Embrace the beauty of nature and discover why this incredible property was awarded the world's #1 romantic hotel at the Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice, Best of the Best 2021 awards.

title: Romantic Sunshine Coast Hinterlands Spicers Villa Retreat
description: Retreat to the lush rainforests of the Sunshine Coast Hinterlands for a romantic couples' rendezvous in the private villas of Spicers Tamarind Retreat. These standalone villas are the perfect couples' escape; emerge rejuvenated from Spa Anise after a massage or mineralised spa, attend a culinary masterclass taught by talented chefs and ignite a passion for fine cuisine. Then, when you're ready, kick back and connect with nature in the private courtyard of a standalone forest villa.
offer_address: 88 Obi Lane South, Maleny QLD 4552, Australia
